author: kfogel
msg: Print a warning if the user seems to be trying to turn off a boolean
property by running propset or propedit from the command-line client.
Subject: Re: Property values for boolean properties.
...and is discussed more in the thread following that message.
Part 1: Clean up and prepare library code for the client change.
SVN_PROP_SPECIAL_VALUE): Deprecate, and set to SVN_PROP_BOOLEAN_VALUE.
in libsvn_wc/props.c, but rewritten to collapse conditional chain.
(svn_wc_prop_get): Just create the canonical value directly, instead
of calling value_of_boolean_prop(), which merely duplicated
(svn_wc_prop_set2): Declare a boolean svn_string_t value at the top
of the function and use it when needed, instead of relying on
Part 2: Add the check to the command-line client.
(svn_cl__propedit): Print a warning if we appear to have a bogus propset.
(svn_cl__propset): Same, but only if opt_state->quiet is false.
Part 4: Improve help output, to prevent this situation in the first place.
(svn_cl__cmd_table."propset"): Mention that propdel should be used

author: giorgio_valoti
msg: * subversion/po/it.po:  - Fixed all fuzzy translations and translated

author: bhuvan
msg: Do not define SVNTreeUnequal exception handler in svntest.main library.
It can be used directly from svntest.tree library, where it is
Do not import "tree" library and do not define SVNTreeUnequal exception

author: pburba
msg: Fix segfault in waiting and bug in update_wc_mergeinfo().
(update_wc_mergeinfo): Last argument to apr_pstrcat() must be NULL.

author: kfogel
msg: Clean up an error code collision between r9664 and r19660 that was
revealed when branches/merge-tracking got merged to trunk in r24027:
(SVN_ERR_MERGE_INFO_PARSE_ERROR): Move to right position in error code
list, increment offset correctly, and document release introduced.
